DisplayForm.Script: <UiScreen> <Title>Enter Order Number</Title> <Operations> <Op type="Submit" action="./scan2ftp"> <Label>Submit</Label> </Op> <Op type="Back" action="./"> <Label>Back</Label> </Op> </Operations> <IoScreen> <IoObject> <Title>Enter Order number</Title> <Description>Enter Order Number</Description> <TextArea id="ordernr"> <InitValue></InitValue> <LetterTypes> <LetterType>Numeric</LetterType> <!-- <LetterType>LowerCase</LetterType> --> <!-- <LetterType>UpperCase</LetterType> --> <!-- <LetterType>Glyph</LetterType> --> </LetterTypes> </TextArea> </IoObject> </IoScreen> </UiScreen>
